name: revdj
text: Since reading this strip, I've gotten to use the phrase "Why do you suck so much at getting us anywhere."  Even though it is an obnoxious thing to say to a lost driver, or someone who is finding google.maps to be working slowly, it is very satisfying.  Thank you, Lyle!

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: I need to use that line on the next person I get lost with!

name: apocowarg
text: You can pretty much plug anything into the phrase "Why do you suck so much at..?" and it will be amusing. But only if the person has no control at all over the issue they're sucking at. For example "Why do you suck so much at aquiring a home equity loan?", said to a homeless man or "Why do you suck so much at Daddy/Daughter Day?", said to an orphan.

name: riazm
text: Why do you suck so much at satisfying me emotionally?

name: greenkoolayd
text: seek the help of a relationship councilor, post-haste.

name: jamb23
text: This is slightly unrelated, but a few weeks ago I walked past two well-dressed twenty-somethings standing outside Euston Station, discussing a Big Issue salesman. Midway through, one of them turned to the other and said, "All I'm saying is, why doesn't he give not being homeless a try?" Your comment reminded me of this terrible man (in a good way).

name: ambala
text: Lie Bot looks unconcernedly out the window.

name: nexus
text: I promise!

name: ssddr
text: I like lie bot's non-commital response.

name: gompo
text: Lie bot didn't actually lock that door, did he.  And all this time I thought it was Phillipe's fault.

name: spectre

name: puguglypress
text: It's okay guys, this guy figured it out

name: nilehus
text:
I've actually said "Why do you suck so much at getting us anywhere?" to someone who was giving me directions before. This was before I read this strip.

Awesome coincidence.

name: hcaz

name: baryonyx
text: Well this strip is underrated. Phileppe's "I promise!" is worth a 5 in itself.

name: aljazeera
text: I like that Teodor is swearing at an otter who is 5, who then takes it so smoothly.

name: kamet
text: Yah, the fact that they expect Philippe to be the impetus is just great.

text: Did they try the ignition at any point?

text:
What kind of terrorists are 9/11-ing the rating here?

text: Is this the first arc?

name: shoinan
text: No I believe Noah got there first.

name: zapatos
text: My 'Health' Teacher told me not to drink Red Bull and Vodka, because it's like hitting the gas and the brake at the same time.  He obviously can't drive.

name: greenkoolayd
text:
vodka[plus]redbull[equals]stupid[plus]hyper

i dont know of a more entertaining state to be in...

name: mrchuckletrouzd
text: Oh, another instance of stuffed-animal ignorance not around anymore.

name: tetsukalian
text: "We can't stop here! This is bat country!"
